messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Kristen
messages.msgSnippet: THanks...I plan to.  I did lay down for a bit and feel a bit better but I promise I ll try to keep my mouth shut on the serious issues until I get some serious
messages.messageBody:
THanks...I plan to. I did lay down for a bit and feel a bit better but I promise I'll try to keep my mouth shut on the serious issues until I get some serious sleep!

I'm trying to put together a fitness/nutrition plan for me. I have gained another 7 pounds in the last 2 weeks. UGH! I've got to do something or I'm going to morph.

I'm already swimming, but I want to add weight training (or yoga or pilates), and a nutrition plan. So, I'm looking stuff up.

kristen


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.msgSnippet: You certainly have been working hard & you do need your sleep.  Have a good rest! nancyjoz [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

nancyjoz
